thread.title: Dashcam videos reveal exploits of Britain's worst drivers | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Dashcam videos reveal exploits of Britain's worst drivers | Daily Mail Online

author: Luke Barnes For Mailonline
title: Dashcam videos reveal exploits of Britain's worst drivers | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share Instead they'll have the joy of explaining to police how they managed to crash their car in such a bizarre position. Another segment of the video shows a minivan nonchalantly hitting a parked hatchback on a quiet residential street. The driver of this car in Belfast will have to answer about how he got in such a bizarre accident The driver of the hatchback is stunned at a how the minivan managed to hit his parked car The driver of the hatchback looks visibly worse for wear as he emerges from his parked car, wondering how the hapless minivan driver managed to hit him. The compilation of motorway carnage was released by garage price comparison site Book My Garage . This BMW enters a highway and immediately tries to overtake the car in the central lane He squeezes through a tiny gap between two cars in a shocking display of driving dangerously The driver of the BMW then speeds off leaving other motorists white-knuckled in their wake Book My Garage CEO Douglas Rotberg said: 'While everyone enjoys watching these terrible displays of driving they also illustrate the importance of dashcams. 'If you get one mounted in your car, you are safe in the knowledge that you will have a recording of any reckless behaviour.' Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
